characterDescription.skinTone: fair skin with subtle pink undertones, slightly flushed cheeks, even complexion with minor shadows under the eyes.
characterDescription.eyeColor: bright sky blue eyes with a darker blue limbal ring, no visible flecks.
characterDescription.eyeShape: almond-shaped eyes, slightly downturned at the outer corners, average length eyelashes.
characterDescription.hairColor: medium chestnut brown with subtle natural highlights and darker roots.
characterDescription.hairTexture: wavy hair with defined curls, medium density, prone to frizzing, slightly coarse texture.
characterDescription.hairStyle: hair pulled up into two high buns on top of the head, secured with light pink clips with white fuzzy pom-poms, with some shorter strands left loose around the face.
characterDescription.faceShape: round face with full cheeks, soft jawline, and a gently sloping forehead.
characterDescription.nose: small, slightly upturned nose with a rounded tip and barely visible nostrils.
characterDescription.lips: naturally pink lips, slightly fuller bottom lip than top lip, defined cupid's bow.
characterDescription.smile: no smile present, but mouth appears to be naturally downturned at the corners.
characterDescription.eyebrows: medium-thick, dark brown eyebrows, slightly arched, well-groomed.
characterDescription.ears: medium-sized ears, close to the head, with clearly defined lobes.
characterDescription.cheeks: full, round cheeks with slight natural rosiness.
characterDescription.facialProportions: eyes are large relative to face size, nose is small, and mouth is average sized, even proportions overall.
characterDescription.distinctiveFeatures: very slight shadow under the eyes, very small barely visible freckles near nose, pink clips with white fluffy pom-poms in the hair.
characterDescription.overallImpression: sweet and slightly serious appearance, with youthful baby-faced features.
characterDescription.fullDescription: This is a 5-6 year old girl with fair skin and subtle pink undertones. Her bright sky blue eyes are almond-shaped and slightly downturned at the outer corners. She has medium chestnut brown wavy hair styled into two high buns on top of her head secured with light pink clips and fuzzy white pom-poms. Her face is round with full cheeks and a small, slightly upturned nose. She has naturally pink lips with a slightly fuller bottom lip and medium-thick, well-groomed dark brown eyebrows; very slight shadow under the eyes and very small freckles near nose are unique traits.
